attributes.action: If energy bosses are foregoing their bonuses then MPs should be barred from charging their own energy bills to the taxpayer.
attributes.additional_details: It is an immorality that MPs and their families get their food AND their heating paid for by people who can afford only to do ONE of those two activities.  'We make you choose to Heat or Eat while we make you pay for our heating and food' should be adopted as the slogan for ALL political parties
